HealthcareFacilityNetwork.name: HealthcareFacilityNetwork
HealthcareFacilityNetwork.description: Represents a junction object identifying the insurance network that a location or business entity is a part of. Network participation records are also stored in this object.

AccountId.description: Account associated with this facility network.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this facility network is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this facility network is no longer effective.

GenderRestriction.description: Indicates whether this facility network only applies to male or female patients or members instead of all patients or members.

HealthcareFacilityId.description: References the HealthcareFacility record associated with the network. Use this field if the associated provider is a business account.

HealthcareProviderId.description: Healthcare provider associated with this facility network.

HighestValidAge.description: Indicates the highest age of patient that this facility network is applicable for.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LowestValidAge.description: Indicates the lowest age of patient that this facility network is applicable for.

Name.description: Name of the facility network record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PanelLimit.description: Indicates the maximum number of patients in the practitioner's panel for this payer network and practitioner location.

PanelStatus.description: Indicates whether the practitioner is accepting new patients based on the status of their patient panel.

PayerNetworkId.description: Payer network associated with this facility network.

PractitionerFacilityId.description: Practitioner facility associated with this facility network. Use this field if the provider associated with the network is an individual practitioner.

PractitionerId.description: The individual practitioner associated with the facility network.

ProviderNetworkContractId.description: Provider network contract associated with this facility network

ProviderNetworkTierId.description: Provider network tier associated with this facility network.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.
